evidence: In image processing, we model it using something called a point spread function-or PSF for short.
The process that causes blurring is called convolution.
Indeed, in the Fourier domain, convolution becomes regular multiplication.
The Fourier transform is often performed using a fast algorithm, FFT in short.
It takes clever algorithms and good models-but it can be done.
